pages.text: The Key of Binding is a mystical key bound to a blood mage's Soul Network. Its primary purpose is to share your LP with friends - give a bound key to an ally and they can bind their items to YOUR Soul Network, drawing from your LP reserves.

pages.title: Sharing LP
pages.text: $(blood)Multiplayer Cooperation$()$(br2)1. Bind the key to yourself (right-click)$(br)2. Give the bound key to a friend$(br)3. Your friend holds it in their offhand$(br)4. Any items they bind will use YOUR Soul Network$(br2)This allows you to power your allies' sigils and bound tools without them needing their own LP infrastructure!

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: $(bold)Binding:$() Right-click while holding to bind to your Soul Network$(br2)$(bold)Offhand:$() Hold in offhand while binding items to use the key owner's network$(br2)$(bold)Curio Slot:$() Can be equipped in the "key" curio slot for the same effect$(br2)$(bold)Crafting:$() Used in recipes requiring player binding

pages.title: Strategic Uses
pages.text: $(animus)Team Strategies:$()$(br)- Designate one player as the LP generator$(br)- Share keys with combat-focused teammates$(br)- Power expensive rituals from a friend's network$(br)- Let new players use advanced sigils immediately$(br2)$(italic)The key to unlocking cooperation in the sanguine arts.$()
